name: Carl TÃ¶rnqvist
body:
I am a front end web developer based in Stockholm, Sweden.

I have been making high quality stuff for the web for over halv a decade. During my adventures across the web I have come to find myself comfortable with [component oriented CSS](http://suitcss.github.io), large scale JavaScript applications using frameworks like [Backbone](http://backbonejs.org) and accessible HTML markup.

## Things I've made
- [Coop.se](http://coop.se): **Front end architecture.** One of Sweden's largest chain of supermarkets.
- [Marginalen.se](https://www.marginalen.se): **Front end architecture.** An all-digital Swedish bank with a breadth of services.
- [dialog](https://github.com/tornqvist/dialog): **Creator and maintainer.** A responsive jQuery dialog plugin. Old but still kicking.
- [backbone.intactmodel](https://github.com/daytona/backbone.intactmodel): **Creator and maintainer.** Strictly typed Backbone model with session and derived attributes.
- [backbone.asyncautocomplete](https://github.com/daytona/backbone.asyncautocomplete): **Creator and maintainer.** Autocomplete with async support as Backbone view.

## Ways to reach me
- [calle.tornqvist@gmail.com](mailto:calle.tornqvist@gmail.com)
- [twitter.com/carltornqvist](https://twitter.com/carltornqvist)
- [github.com/tornqvist](https://github.com/tornqvist)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
